subject: Lacrosse
College Athletics
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Duke’s lacrosse team endured 13 character-testing months marked by rape allegations against players and a discarded season, all for another chance to compete for a national championship. Once they finally made it to the postseason, a lengthy weather delay was no big deal.
